text: Yahweh Refines Stubborn Israel
Hear this, house of Jacob,
who are called by the name of Israel
and came out from the waters of Judah,
who swear by the name of Yahweh,
and ⸤invoke⸥\f + \fr 48:1 \ft Literally “cause to remember” \f* the God of Israel,
\add but\add* not in truth
and not in righteousness.
For they call themselves ⸤after the holy city⸥,\f + \fr 48:2 \ft Literally “from the city of the holiness” \f*
and they lean on the God of Israel—
Yahweh of hosts \add is\add* his name.
“I declared the former things from ⸤of old⸥,\f + \fr 48:3 \ft Literally “then” \f*
and they went out from my mouth.
And I ⸤announced⸥\f + \fr 48:3 \ft Literally “caused to hear” \f* them suddenly;
I acted,\f + \fr 48:3 \ft Or “did” \f* and they came \add to pass\add*,
because ⸤I know⸥\f + \fr 48:4 \ft Literally “knowing me” \f* that you \add are\add* obstinate,
and your neck an iron sinew,
and your forehead bronze.
And I declared \add them\add* to you from of old;
I ⸤ announced⸥\f + \fr 48:5 \ft Literally “caused to hear” \f* \add them\add* to you before they came \add to pass\add*
so that you would not say, ‘My idol did them,
and my image and my cast image commanded them.’
You have heard; see it all.
And will you not declare \add it\add*?
I ⸤announce⸥\f + \fr 48:6 \ft Literally “cause to hear” \f* new things to you from this time
and hidden things that\f + \fr 48:6 \ft Or “and” \f* you have not known.
Now they are created, and not from ⸤of old⸥,\f + \fr 48:7 \ft Literally “then” \f*
and before today, and you have not heard them
so that you could not say, “Look! I knew them.”
Neither have you heard, nor have you known,
nor from ⸤of old⸥\f + \fr 48:8 \ft Literally “then” \f* has your ear been opened.
For I knew you would deal treacherously, very treacherously,
and you \add are\add* called a rebel from \add the\add* womb.
For the sake of my name I ⸤refrain from⸥\f + \fr 48:9 \ft Literally “make long” \f* my anger,
and \add for\add* my praise I restrain \add it\add* for you
\add so as\add* not to cut you off.
Look! I have refined you, but\f + \fr 48:10 \ft Or “and” \f* not like\f + \fr 48:10 \ft Or “with” \f* silver;
I have chosen you in \add the\add* furnace of misery.
For my own sake, for my own sake I do \add it\add*;
for why should it\f + \fr 48:11 \ft That is, my name \f* be defiled?
And I will not give my glory to another.”
Yahweh Frees Israel
“Listen to me, Jacob,
and Israel, ⸤whom I called⸥:\f + \fr 48:12 \ft Literally “who was called by me” \f*
I \add am\add* he. I \add am the\add* first;
also I \add am the\add* last.
Indeed, my hand founded \add the\add* earth,
and my right hand spread out \add the\add* heavens;
\add when\add* I summon\f + \fr 48:13 \ft Or “calling” \f* them, they stand in position together.
Assemble, all of you, and hear!
Who among them declared these \add things\add*?
Yahweh loves him;
he shall perform\f + \fr 48:14 \ft Or “do” \f* his wish against Babylon
and his arm \add against\add* ⸤the Chaldeans⸥.\f + \fr 48:14 \ft Literally “Chaldea” \f*
I, I myself, I have spoken!
Indeed, I have called him.
I have brought him,
and he will be successful \add in\add* his way.
Draw near to me; hear this! I have not spoken in secrecy from \add the\add* ⸤beginning⸥;\f + \fr 48:16 \ft Literally “head” \f*
from \add the\add* time ⸤it came to be⸥,\f + \fr 48:16 \ft Literally “\fq of \ft becoming it” \f* there I \add have been\add*;
And now the Lord Yahweh has sent me and his Spirit.”
Thus says Yahweh, your redeemer, the holy one of Israel:
“I \add am\add* Yahweh your God, ⸤who teaches⸥\f + \fr 48:17 \ft Literally “teaching” \f* you to profit,
leads you in \add the\add* way you should go.
O that you had listened attentively to my commandments!
Then\f + \fr 48:18 \ft Or “and” \f* your prosperity would have been like \add a\add* river,
and your righteousness like the waves of the sea.
And your offspring would have been like the sand,
and the descendants of your ⸤body⸥\f + \fr 48:19 \ft Literally “intestines” \f* like its grains.\f + \fr 48:19 \ft Hebrew “grain” \f*
It would not be cut off,
and its name would not be destroyed from my presence.”
Go out from Babylon!
Flee from Chaldea!
Proclaim\f + \fr 48:20 \ft Or “announce” \f* \add it\add* with a shout\f + \fr 48:20 \ft Or “sound” \f* of rejoicing; proclaim\f + \fr 48:20 \ft Or “cause to hear” \f* this!
⸤Send it forth⸥\f + \fr 48:20 \ft Literally “Cause it to go out” \f* to the end of the earth;
say, “Yahweh has redeemed his servant Jacob!”
And \add when\add* he led them through the deserts, they were not thirsty;
he made water flow from \add the\add* rock for them,
and he split \add the\add* rock,
and \add the\add* water gushed out.
“There is no peace,” says Yahweh, “for the wicked.”
